                  [
                    "c"
                  ]
                ]
              ],
              [

                "auto",
                [
                  [
                    "c"
                  ]
                ]

          "properties": {
            "title": [

              ],
              [
                "auto",
                [
                  [
                    "c"
                  ]
                ]
              ],
              [
                " doesn’t help, since you might not know which dimension of your element will be larger. However, to cover certain areas with an image (and correct aspect ratio) completely or to contain an image with correct aspect ratio completely in a background area, the values, "
              ],
              [
                "contain",
                [
                  [
                    "c"
                  ]
                ]
              ],
              [
                " and "
              ],
              [
                "cover",
                [
                  [
                    "c"
                  ]
                ]
              ],
              [
                " provide the additional functionality."
